author: Teo45dore
name: T's BepInEx Template
description: Yet another template for creating BepInEx 5 plugins.

Target Framework.description: The target framework for the project

Unity Version.description: Unity version to reference whilst developing the plugin

Plugin GUID.description: A unique identifier for the plugin, e.g., com.YourName.YourModName

BepInEx Plugin Directory (Optional).description: If filled out, automatically copy over the project's dll to the specified directory for quicker testing.
